analysis.description:
EverFountainBeanSale.trade (/unique_contracts/0xd68cb2a1f51171c295cac3a7d27c15068922de8a.sol#429-472) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.burn(msg.sender,consume) (/unique_contracts/0xd68cb2a1f51171c295cac3a7d27c15068922de8a.sol#441)
	-token.mint(msg.sender,gain) (/unique_contracts/0xd68cb2a1f51171c295cac3a7d27c15068922de8a.sol#463-465)
	-token.mint(msg.sender,gain) (/unique_contracts/0xd68cb2a1f51171c295cac3a7d27c15068922de8a.sol)
	-token.burn(msg.sender,consume) (/unique_contracts/0xd68cb2a1f51171c295cac3a7d27c15068922de8a.sol)
